page.title: 01A general description
page.content: {Ramsey,and the Oakley's { ----------------------- Although our area does contain some local industry,situated in Upper Dovercourt,it is in it's nature still mainly a rural and residential environment. The landscape is one of gentle slopes,and wide sweeping views across the fields.In the distance can be seen the busy quay and refinery at Parkeston.While across the river Stour,the county of Suffolk lies revealed. Twisting country lanes take you through the linked villages of Little and Great Oakley,leading to the small village of Ramsey,which is dominated by it's Windmill. The area has an interesting past,an is well worth visiting,to catch a flavour of the local history.
